bibl.title: Photograph of Paul H. Streit at a celebration marking the 100th anniversary of the birth of Walter Reed, Walter Reed Army Medical Center, Washington, D.C., September 7, 1951

div1.head: Photograph of Paul H. Streit at a celebration marking the 100th anniversary of the birth of Walter Reed, Walter Reed Army Medical Center, Washington, D.C., September 7, 1951
div1.p: WALTER REED ARMY MEDICAL CENTER, Washington, D.C., September 7, 1951

Local unions of the American Federation of Labor present cakes to Walter Reed
Army Medical Center patients and duty personnel in honor of the 100th birth anni-
versary of Major Walter Reed for whom the Center was named. Major General Paul
H. Streit, commanding general of the Center, passes a portion of cake to a hospital
patient recently returned from action in Korea, while other hospital patients
await their turns.
